parks.name: Maasai-Mara
parks.description: The incomparable Masai Mara is one of the world's greatest wildlife destinations

parks.name: kran destination
parks.description: The ideal relaxation haven. Our lounge is a destination hot-spot for both international guests and locals alike. Exuding classic charm and polished refinement to ensure guests can relax in total comfort. It is an intimate setting brimming with unique features, stylish furnishing and original artwork

parks.name: Lake Nakuru Lodge
parks.description: Nestled along Kenya Great Rift Valley, Lake Nakuru National Park offers a diverse landscape of rocky caves, brushy grasslands, and, of course, Lake Nakuru. The national park is populated with an abundance of wildlife, including more than 400 different bird specie

parks.name: Leopard Camp
parks.description: Leopard Point Luxury Beach Resort & Spa is by the ocean, within a 15-minute drive of Marine Park and Malindi Beach

parks.name: Tsavo Park
parks.amenities: large herds of elephants and captivating landscapes
parks.description: Tsavo National Park is one of Kenya’s oldest and largest national parks, and is the country’s largest protected area

parks.name: Lamu Island
parks.description: The small island of Lamu, northeast of Mombasa, oozes old-world charm. A UNESCO World Heritage Site, Lamu Old Town is Kenya's oldest continually inhabited settlement, with origins dating back to the 12th century

parks.name: Lake Naivasha
parks.description: A haven for birders, Lake Naivasha lies at the highest point of the Great Rift Valley.

parks.name: Nairobi National Park
parks.description: Visiting this wildlife-rich park is one of the top things to do if you're staying in Nairobi, and it makes a rewarding day trip

parks.name: Mount Kenya National Park
parks.description: Mount Kenya National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site that provides the rare spectacle of equatorial snow

parks.name: Hell's Gate National Park
parks.description: Hell's Gate offers excellent climbing and hiking opportunities, with two extinct volcanoes

parks.name: Ol Pejeta Conservancy
parks.description: Ol Pejeta Conservancy is a prime place for close-up wildlife encounters.
